column.name: tjr1
column.annotate: 填入：行员代号（推荐人1与2不能一样）

sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dktjrgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'推荐人1输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.tjr1)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dktjrgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'推荐人1不存在!' where not exists(select 1 from khdx_hy h where rtrim(t.tjr1)=rtrim(h.hydh)) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dktjrgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'推荐人1分配比例输入错误，只能输入:3位整数,2位小数!' where f_java_rule_length(t.tjr1fpbl)>0 and f_java_rule_number(t.tjr1fpbl,3,2)=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dktjrgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'推荐人1分配比例输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.tjr1fpbl)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dktjrgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'推荐人2分配比例输入错误，只能输入:3位整数,2位小数!' where f_java_rule_length(t.tjr2fpbl)>0 and f_java_rule_number(t.tjr2fpbl,3,2)=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dktjrgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'备注说明输入错误，长度不能超过:100!' where f_java_rule_length(t.bzsm)>100 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dktjrgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'账号输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.zhdh)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dktjrgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'账号不存在!' where not exists(select 1 from jxdx_dkzh d where rtrim(t.zhdh)=rtrim(d.zhdh)) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ UPDATE dktjrgldr_temp t SET error = error || '推荐人1、2比例之和必须为100！' where (cast(t.tjr1fpbl as decimal(19,2)) + cast(coalesce((case when t.tjr2fpbl='' then '0' else t.tjr2fpbl end), '0') as decimal(19,2))) !=100 and t.khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ UPDATE dktjrgldr_temp t SET error = error || '推荐人2不能等于推荐人1！' WHERE t.tjr2=t.tjr1 and t.khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ UPDATE dktjrgldr_temp t SET error = error || '推荐人2存在时，此项不能为空！' WHERE tjr2fpbl is null and EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM khdx_hy a WHERE t.tjr2=a.khdxdh) AND t.khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dktjrgldr_temp t SET error = error || '该笔帐户所属的客户在有效天数内有其它贷款！' where exists ( select 1 from jxdx_dkzh qtdk inner join (select d.zhdh,d.khh,f_change_days(d.ffrq,-cast(tz.csz as integer)) ffrq_tz,d.ffrq from jxdx_dkzh d, xtb_xtcs tz where tz.csmc='DKXKHYXTS') dk on qtdk.KHH=dk.khh and qtdk.zhdh!=dk.zhdh where qtdk.dqrq>=dk.ffrq_tz and qtdk.FFRQ<=dk.ffrq and dk.zhdh=t.zhdh ) and t.khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dktjrgldr_temp t SET error = error || '该笔贷款已结清，不能维护！' where exists ( select 1 from jxdx_dkzh qtdk where qtdk.zhye=0 and qtdk.zhdh=t.zhdh ) and t.khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dktjrgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'数据已存在!' where exists(select 1 from sglr_dktjr tar ,JXDX_DKZH JXDX_DKZH0 where 1=1 and t.zhdh=JXDX_DKZH0.ZHDH and JXDX_DKZH0.JXDXDH=tar.JXDXDH and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (length(t.error)=0 or t.error is null ))

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dktjrgldr_temp t set t.error=error||'存在重复数据!' where exists( select 1 from (select zhdh from dktjrgldr_temp dr where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ group by zhdh having count(1)>1 ) dr where 1=1 and t.zhdh=dr.zhdh) and khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ CREATE TABLE dktjrgldr_temp ( zhdh varchar(100) , tjr1 varchar(100) , tjr1fpbl varchar(100) , tjr2 varchar(100) , tjr2fpbl varchar(100) , bzsm varchar(100) , khdxdh integer,error varchar(1000) )
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from dktjrgldr_temp where length(error) > 0 and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from dktjrgldr_temp where length(error) > 0 and error != '数据已存在!' and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, zhdh,tjr1,tjr1fpbl,tjr2,tjr2fpbl,bzsm,khdxdh,error from dktjrgldr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and length(error)>0
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from (select '' as zt, zhdh,tjr1,tjr1fpbl,tjr2,tjr2fpbl,bzsm,khdxdh,error from dktjrgldr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ )a
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, zhdh,tjr1,tjr1fpbl,tjr2,tjr2fpbl,bzsm,khdxdh,error from dktjrgldr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ insert into SGLR_DKTJR (JXDXDH, TJRQ,TJR1, TJR1FPBL, TJR2, TJR2FPBL, BZSM, CZR, CZSJ) SELECT JXDX_DKZH0.JXDXDH, $sysdate$,khdx_hy1.KHDXDH, cast (t.tjr1fpbl AS DECIMAL (9, 5)),coalesce(khdx_hy2.KHDXDH,0), cast ((case when length(coalesce(t.tjr2fpbl,''))>0 then t.tjr2fpbl else '0' end) AS DECIMAL (9, 5)), t.bzsm, '$login_hydh$',F_GET_SYSTIME () from dktjrgldr_temp t inner join JXDX_DKZH JXDX_DKZH0 on JXDX_DKZH0.ZHDH = cast (t.zhdh AS VARCHAR (40)) inner join khdx_hy khdx_hy1 on khdx_hy1.HYDH = cast (t.tjr1 AS VARCHAR (12)) left join khdx_hy khdx_hy2 on khdx_hy2.HYDH = cast (t.tjr2 AS VARCHAR (12)) where t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (t.error = '数据已存在!' or length(t.error) = 0 or t.error is null)
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from sglr_dktjr tar where exists(select 1 from dktjrgldr_temp t ,JXDX_DKZH JXDX_DKZH0 where 1=1 and t.zhdh=JXDX_DKZH0.ZHDH and JXDX_DKZH0.JXDXDH=tar.JXDXDH and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ )
